title: Analysis of Remote Education Video Effectiveness: Mathematics Lecture Design Strategies

context.additional_context: A short-term corporate manager training program conducted in limited-technology environments using smartphones, measuring learning effectiveness through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can compare the impact of visual motion differences between two video types (hand-drawn vs. PPT narration) on engagement levels.
Learners can explain how prior knowledge levels affect video learning outcomes (retention/transfer).
Learners can propose video production strategies suitable for corporate training contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
